places.name: The entrance
places.desc: You are in front of a massive oak door. You are hungry.

places.name: The nap
places.desc: You take a small nap. It's resting. But you're still hungry.

places.name: The corridor
places.desc: You are in a corridor. You can either go to the left for the dining room, or to the right for the bedroom.

places.name: The bedroom
places.desc: The bedroom has a bed, but no food is in sight.

actions.action_name: Go back from where I come.

places.name: The dining room
places.desc: You are in a large dining room. There is a large plate of carrots on the table.

places.name: The meal
places.desc: You eat your plate of carrots. You are no more hungry. Bravo !
